main event: A sighting of an unidentified object described as a tear drop shape, large as a bomber, white in color with no exhaust or trail occurred on August 27, 1954 in Dorchester, Massachusetts.
interesting points: The object was observed visually for 2 minutes,The sighting was recorded by civilians,There was only one object reported,The report notes that there were no exhaust or trail observed from the object,The conclusions state insufficient data for evaluation.
sighted object: tear drop shape object, large as bomber, white in color
witness description: civilian observers, one wearing Polaroid glasses
